definition: in confusion or disorder/in a confused state of mind/disorder/upheaval/riot/illicit sexual relations/to throw into disorder/to mix up/indiscriminate/random/arbitrary

pinyin: chuang1 shang1 hou4 ya1 li4 wen3 luan4

sentences.english: This disease is much as het-up as spirit, bring about endocrine function to be concerned mussily .
sentences.chinese: 本病多与精神过度紧张，导致内分泌功能紊乱有关。

sentences.english: It boosted their cardiovascular function and improved other age-related disorders.
sentences.chinese: 功能，改善因年龄增长而产生的功能紊乱。

sentences.english: The procedure was performed in 16 patients with sleep-disordered breathing.
sentences.chinese: 在16例睡眠呼吸紊乱的程序进行。

sentences.english: This type of genetic variation is more common in those with brain disorders, they noted.
sentences.chinese: 他们注意到，这类遗传变异更加经常和大脑紊乱有关。

sentences.english: RV enlargement and trabecular derangement also were suggested by MRI.
sentences.chinese: MRI也提示右心腔扩大，右心室肌小梁排列紊乱。

sentences.english: Organism disorder in cell and humoral immunity is one of causes resulting in its relapse.
sentences.chinese: 机体细胞及体液免疫紊乱成为易复发的原因之一。

sentences.english: Kindness, righteousness, propriety , wisdom and trustworthiness. These five virtues should be strictly adhere to and should not be violated.
sentences.chinese: 仁义礼智信是做人的五条准则，必须遵守，不容紊乱。

sentences.english: The overall rate of other disorders was also pretty similar among college students and non-students.
sentences.chinese: 同样，其它紊乱的总体比例在这两个人群中也很接近。

sentences.english: All I had ever seen were women with eating disorders.
sentences.chinese: 我所看到的一切都是女人患有进食紊乱。

sentences.english: And it’s been linked to cancer and metabolic disorders leading to obesity.
sentences.chinese: 癌症和新陈代谢紊乱导致的肥胖也被认为与此有关。

sentences.english: Now new research suggests children of older fathers are also at risk for developmental disorders.
sentences.chinese: 年长父亲的孩子们也冒着发育紊乱的风险。

sentences.english: Conclusions The water and blood sodium disorder in patients with craniopharyngiomas after surgery appears to present complicated course.
sentences.chinese: 结论颅咽管瘤全切术后水钠平衡紊乱情况复杂。

sentences.english: Beauty ideals are blamed for eating disorders and body alienation.
sentences.chinese: 饮食紊乱和身体异化归咎于美的理想。

sentences.english: This kind of separation is, by definition, sacroiliac dysfunction.
sentences.chinese: 理论上说，这种分离理论上就是骶髂关节功能紊乱。

sentences.english: These elements must be carefully managed to avoid overly tangled models.
sentences.chinese: 这些元素必须被小心地管理以避免模型的过度紊乱。

sentences.english: South Georgia suffers from a meteorological version of bi­polar disorder.
sentences.chinese: 南乔治亚岛经受着极地紊乱气候的无情摆布。

definition: imbalance/to become dysfunctional/to lack proper care (after an illness etc)
to undulate/to fluctuate/wave motion/rise and fall

pinyin: zi4 zhu3 shen2 jing1 xi4 tong3
